website_summaries.verdict: Designed for quick setup and takedown, this obstacle course will provide hours of enjoyment.
pros: Built to withstand a heavy load
Has three monkey fists, two monkey bars, and two gymnastic rings, along with steel carabiners that are strong and sturdy
Can carry a max load of 300 lb
cons: Setup instructions aren’t always included in the package, which can make it more difficult than it needs to be

customer_reviews.title: Quality product with easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our son who loves things like this (monkey bars at school, ropes courses when on vacations). We easily attached this to a couple trees in the backyard. We then decided to move it and it literally was a piece of cake to repostion on two different trees. Overall it appears to be a quality set that is easily put together.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: We are giving this for Christmas so have yet to truly test it out. But the quality is there and all seems well built. One complaint is no paperwork or instructions came with the box. It’s fairly self explanatory but I didn’t like that there was no info with it. Will update this post after putting it up if anything is different from first glance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Now you can be a ninja too!
customer_reviews.text: I have competed on the American ninja warrior TV show for the past 3 years and my girls have always wanted to try being a ninja. Now that they have ANW jr. My girls can train for it! So they will be so excited to open this crazy awesome ninja slackline this christmas! So excited my self!!!
customer_reviews.author: Aw

customer_reviews.title: Kids dont use it bc the accessories hurt their hands
customer_reviews.text: I had to read the instructions several times but eventually figured it out. The kids were excited about it but after a few uses they weren't crazy about it because the accessories hurt their hands. It looks cool and fun but the ring handles aren't comfortable and those monkey knots are the worst. I think if I did it again I would try to get something that advertises comfort grip or something like that.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: It broke with a 64lb kiddo!!!
customer_reviews.text: Problem 1. The stations are just a little too far apart for a 10 year old but hopefully with some practice she'll overcome that. Problem 2. Biggest problem...... the monkey bar cracked in half with my daughter on it. CRACKED. IN. HALF!!!! She's 64 lbs. This equipment is tolerable for up to 300 pounds. Im expecting an exchange for a new one and I'm hoping damage is reversable as my daughter is now scared to death to try it again. GRRRRRR
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great fun easy setup
customer_reviews.text: I have six boys who love to play outside. They were very excited to get this obstacle line set up. It was easy enough for my teenage boys to set up and has been so fun. They are all getting stronger because of it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: So fun, my kids LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my kids favorite things in our backyard! We strung it between 2 trees and my kids are having a heyday! The slackline has additional spaces on it for more things to hang than what's included. So we got some additional rings and added them on. Our backyard is now the hit of the neighborhood. I also love that it came with tree protectors. And that it all folds up so small for storage for the winter!! Its a win!
customer_reviews.author: Brad B

customer_reviews.title: A Blast for the grandkids!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old grandson (his birthday present) loves to watch the Ninja-style games on TV. This set was easy to assemble and has already provided hours of fun for my grandchildren, ages 5,6, & 8. In fact, it was so much fun that he is in the process of building a much larger course to join the original.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can’t wait to use them outside
customer_reviews.text: Tried them inside just make sure u have a mat, very durable solid materials great gift for the kids
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: WAY too hard for younger kids and no instructions for adding items
customer_reviews.text: The obstacle course is nicely done, but way too hard for younger kids. The site offers no assistance for adding items in between what is supplied as other obstacle lines do.
customer_reviews.author: Margo Louis

customer_reviews.title: Kids Love it
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put up and the kids love it. Nice obstacle course kit that the kids have fun on and get some strength exercising done.
customer_reviews.author: Dblagrave

customer_reviews.title: Room to add on!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what was promised! My granddaughter loves it. Carabiners a bit tough to force through the loops, but looks like it will stand up to repeated use. Already looking at additional accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Shull

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely LOVE it, my kids, 6 and 3, had so much fun, all the items has great quality, not that easy to out up together, my husband struggle a little bit but it worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Get a better model
customer_reviews.text: Not the easiest to put up and it’s not as fun as it appears
customer_reviews.author: Justin Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Awful, Awful
customer_reviews.text: Awful product, there is no instruction within the packgae. I wouldn't recommend to anyone who wants to try this...
customer_reviews.author: John John

customer_reviews.title: Good fun
customer_reviews.text: Well made and fairly easy to assemble. Big hit with the grandkids. I can see years of fun
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good value at all
customer_reviews.text: I was completely unaware that this was just a top and no balance strap on the bottom. Not a good buy at all for $79.99. I was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: C. J. Papineau

product_meta.title: Sonyabecca Ninja Obstacle Course Kit with 7 Hanging Swing Obstacles Warrior Training with 40FT Slackline 2 Gymnastic Rings 3 Monkey Fists Monkey 2 Mokey Bar Holds 2 Tree Protector
feature_bullets: Quick Set Up & Take Down:The safety ratchet system and 40ft slackline can be quickly and safely set up almost anywhere, coming with 2 pieces 3.3ft tree protectors, well protect trees.All you need is two trees, pillars, beams or bars which are 20-30ft apart and strong enough to bear the weight of the kit plus whoever is using it.

7 Hanging Obstacles,Customize Your Own Course:This obstacle course kit includes 2 gymnastic rings, 3 monkey fists,2 monkey bar holds. Each obstacle can be placed on any of the 15 pockets using the durable steel carabiners. This ninja warrior equipment can also be used as a traditional slackline.

Powerful Load: We believe in safety first! That means strong, heavy-duty materials and several tiers of quality control throughout the manufacturing process. Our equipment is made for ages 5+ with a max recommended weight of300lbs.A convenient carry case lets you take it wherever you go, from the park to a birthday party to a camping trip.

Anywhere Use: The portable ninja line course and ratchet system can quickly be set up almost anywhere.Play it on your backyard, playground, outdoors, indoor, home gym, pool, fitness class, party, camping trip, beach, park and anywhere.

Play And Exercise For All Ages:This backyard hanging obstacle course kit, featuring a variety of multi-skill-level obstacles, allows kids to train harder and harder by moving the obstacles further apart as their skills improve.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars45 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
